name: Mad Pizza Rush
description:
Dash across the pizzeria to serve customers their delicious pizzas!

But beware, customers have limited patience and will leave if you don’t serve them on time.

You must reach the tips goal for that shift to advance each day. Reach the end of the week to win!

Failing to achieve a set number of goals will grant you an upgrade for the rest of the game, but you won’t get the tip bonuses for those tasks. Strike the right balance between failing tasks and obtaining tips to complete each shift and get your upgrades!

The downloadable version is identical to the HTML one, it's included for convenience.
